memberdef.name: K_MEM_PARTITION_IS_WRITABLE
memberdef.initializer: ({ \ int __is_writable__; \ switch (attr.ap_attr) { \ case MPU_REGION_WRITE: \ case MPU_REGION_SU_RW: \ __is_writable__ = 1; \ break; \ default: \ __is_writable__ = 0; \ } \ __is_writable__; \ })

memberdef.name: K_MEM_PARTITION_IS_EXECUTABLE
memberdef.initializer: ({ \ int __is_executable__; \ switch (attr.ap_attr) { \ case MPU_REGION_SU_RX: \ case MPU_REGION_EXEC: \ __is_executable__ = 1; \ break; \ default: \ __is_executable__ = 0; \ } \ __is_executable__; \ })
